Pore/Structural Features.Pore Size: 6.9 Å x 8.8 Å x 9.1 Å (Van der Waals radii considered)

Guest Molecules.Mechanism: Fluorescence quenching via charge transfer complex formation

Other Information.Test Conditions: Room temperature, saturated vapor pressure (5.8 x 10⁻⁶ torr)
Other Information.Additional Info: Quenches the fluorescence of the naphthalene core inside CB[8]

Guest Molecules.Mechanism: Fluorescence quenching via charge transfer complex formation

Other Information.Test Conditions: Room temperature, saturated vapor pressure (1.1 x 10⁻⁴ torr)
Other Information.Additional Info: Quenches the fluorescence of the naphthalene core inside CB[8]

Other Information.Additional Info: Enhances the fluorescence of the naphthalene core inside CB[8]

Other Information.Test Conditions: Room temperature, saturated vapor pressure (1.4 x 10⁻⁸ torr)

Sieving Mechanism: Size exclusion at sub-nanometer scale combined with confinement effects

Experimental Validation.Performance Metrics: Detection limit for TNT: ppt level; Fast response time within seconds

Other Information.Additional Info: The system is regenerable by washing out trapped molecules and shows good sensitivity for explosive detection.
